The event that just took place was onboard a ship traveling through unknown space with its engines switched off. It involved two main characters of the story. Everything is one big cycle. Whatever happens, happens. If you attempt to change it, it will fail. Detective is sent back to where he wakes to a world inhabited by humans. The humans find the alien dna in his brain leading to extraction and development of ai systems.

It's a ever lasting circle. When will it stop?

Vanessa had tracked Antonys ship to just outside of Mars atomsphere. From the footage she was watching of the ship it had switched off it's engines and was drifting through space. She was able to access the CCTV onboard the ship. The achieve of the ships footage was all there. She was able to view all the ships footage of when Antony had boarded the ship on Mars, taken off, and now floating through space. Vanessa started the footage from the start, from when Antony board the ship. The camera she was viewing was inside the ship, pointing towards the entry to the ship.
